//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	declare ( /*@DECLARE_TYPE*/ FLOAT, "mid_area" );
	wait ( 100.000 );
	set ( "mid_area", $random( 0, 2 )$ );
	use ( "dog_front_s" );
	use ( "dog_back_s" );

	if ( $get( FLOAT, "mid_area")$, $<$, $1.000$ )
	{

		task ( "back_bunker" )
		{
			use ( "spawn_in_back_bunker" );
		}

		dowait ( "back_bunker" );
	}


	else (  )
	{

		task ( "fall_tower" )
		{
			use ( "spawn_by_fall_tower" );
		}

		dowait ( "fall_tower" );
	}

}
